sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) Pennsylvanias Republican nominee for governor, Doug Mastriano, has offered to sit for an interview with the congressional committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol and was interviewed by FBI agents last year about it, his lawyer said Thursday.
author: Farnoush Amiri
title: Republican nominee for PA governor Doug Mastriano willing to talk to Jan. 6 committee

author: Rebecca Beitsch
title: Mastriano agrees to interview with Jan. 6 panel

sentence: Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano has turned over evidence to the House Select Committee, including documents showing his arrangements for buses carrying to Donald Trump supporters to Washington, D.C., on Jan. 6, 2021.
author: Travis Gettys
title: Far-right GOP candidate Doug Mastriano turns over documents and receipts to Jan. 6 committee
